events.title: Weekly Storytime with Thumper
events.description: Join Thumper the rabbit for stories, songs, and fun! Perfect for ages 2-5.

events.title: Author Visit: Jane Doe - 'The Lost Kitten'
events.description: Local author Jane Doe reads her new picture book and leads a drawing activity.

events.title: Pajama Storytime
events.description: Wear your pajamas and bring a stuffed animal for an evening of cozy stories.

events.title: Young Writers Workshop
events.description: A creative writing workshop for ages 10-14. Learn to create characters and stories.

events.title: Baby & Me Lapsit
events.description: Gentle stories, songs, and rhymes for babies 0-24 months and their caregivers.

events.title: Illustrator Showcase: Tom Smith
events.description: Learn how picture books are illustrated! Drawing demo and Q&A.
